instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1989 820-00850-A no image
threads.message:
Hi,

I have an A1989 820-00850-A without internal image, and rebooting

Already tried a knlown good display, but only have external image.

I can see image in the external display, but it reboots afetr a few seconds.

Client said that it stoped given image, but it worked on external display for a while.

Can you help?

threads.title: A1989 820-00850-A no image
threads.message:
Did you test disconnecting internal LCD?
Try DFU.

Check diode mode readings on J8500 data lines.
